MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G73 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Kelso Avenue and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.45pm. Our engineers have arrived the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.10pm on Wednesday 24 February 2021.
